episodes.title: 223 - Gloriavale
episodes.description: Lauren and Christy deep dive the New Zealand cult Gloriavale. Christy's research reveals the founder changing the rules to serve himself, SO many cases of abuse, and a suspicious death the cult tried to hide! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party! episodes.title: 156 - Love Has Won: The Cult of Mother God
episodes.description: Lauren and Christy deep dive the Mother God cult, as seen in the HBO doc Love Has Won. Christy's research reveals celebrities from the cult's Galactic team, Father God's criminal history, and the shocking abuse claims left out of the doc! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
